issue.title: Catalog sitemap
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Adding a sitemap functionality based on http://www.sitemaps.org/fr/protocol.html
Administrator can define which resource's type is published inside the sitemap
Only metadata which are in "published" state et which have got "public" access scope are reflected inside the sitemap.

This feature doesn't need to be voted as it was already present in previous easySDI version (but not so well integrated to easySDI package)...


**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
